SUMMARY: REQUIRED | OPTIONAL DETAIL: ELEMENT

org.xmappr
Annotation Type Attribute

@Target(value=FIELD)
@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
public @interface Attribute

Annotation used to map a field to XML attribute.

Optional Element Summary
 java.lang.Class<? extends ValueConverter> converter
          Custom converter assigned to convert this XML attribute.
 java.lang.String defaultValue
          Default value to be used when XML attribute is empty.
 java.lang.String format
          Optional formatting string.
 java.lang.String name
          The name of the XML attribute that a field maps to.
 java.lang.Class targetType
          targetType is used to determine which converter will be used.
 java.lang.String value
          The name of the XML attribute that a field maps to.
 

value

public abstract java.lang.String value
The name of the XML attribute that a field maps to.

Returns:
Default:
""

name

public abstract java.lang.String name
The name of the XML attribute that a field maps to.

Returns:
Default:
""

defaultValue

public abstract java.lang.String defaultValue
Default value to be used when XML attribute is empty.

Returns:
Default:
""

targetType

public abstract java.lang.Class targetType
targetType is used to determine which converter will be used. Either targetType or converter element must be defined when a target field is a Collection.

Returns:
Default:
java.lang.Object.class

converter

public abstract java.lang.Class<? extends ValueConverter> converter
Custom converter assigned to convert this XML attribute. Either targetType or converter element must be defined when a target field is a Collection.

Returns:
Default:
org.xmappr.converters.ValueConverter.class

format

public abstract java.lang.String format
Optional formatting string. Used by converter.

Returns:
Default:
""
